Nov 15 (Reuters) - Third Point LLC :

  • THIRD POINT LLC UPS SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON.COM INC TO 185,000 SHARES FROM 145,000 SHARES - SEC FILING

  • THIRD POINT LLC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2021 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF JUNE 30, 2021

Source for the quarter ended September 30, 2021: https://bit.ly/3HssnRi


Source for the quarter ended June 30, 2021: https://bit.ly/3z6LxI9
